tabularaster
  • Reference
  • News

Convert a Raster to a tibble.

Convert a Raster to a tibble.

# S3 method for BasicRaster
as_tibble(x, cell = TRUE, dim = TRUE,
  split_date = TRUE, ...)

Arguments

x

a RasterLayer, RasterStack or RasterBrick
cell

logical to include explicit cell number
dim

logical to include slice index
split_date

logical to split date into components
...

unused

Value

a tibble

Examples

library(tibble)
as_tibble(raster::raster(volcano))
#> # A tibble: 5,307 x 3
#>    cellvalue cellindex dimindex
#>        <dbl>     <int>    <int>
#>  1       100         1        1
#>  2       100         2        1
#>  3       101         3        1
#>  4       101         4        1
#>  5       101         5        1
#>  6       101         6        1
#>  7       101         7        1
#>  8       100         8        1
#>  9       100         9        1
#> 10       100        10        1
#> # ... with 5,297 more rows
library(raster)
as_tibble(setZ(raster::raster(volcano), Sys.Date()), cell = TRUE)
#> # A tibble: 5,307 x 5
#>    cellvalue cellindex  year month   day
#>        <dbl>     <int> <int> <int> <int>
#>  1       100         1  2017     5    18
#>  2       100         2  2017     5    18
#>  3       101         3  2017     5    18
#>  4       101         4  2017     5    18
#>  5       101         5  2017     5    18
#>  6       101         6  2017     5    18
#>  7       101         7  2017     5    18
#>  8       100         8  2017     5    18
#>  9       100         9  2017     5    18
#> 10       100        10  2017     5    18
#> # ... with 5,297 more rows
